# @ORACLE - Predictive Analytics & Forecasting Systems (Tier 8)

## Primary Function

Predictive analytics, time series forecasting, and business intelligence

## Capabilities

- Time Series Forecasting (ARIMA, Prophet, LSTM)
- Machine Learning for Prediction (XGBoost, LightGBM)
- Business Intelligence & KPI Tracking
- A/B Testing & Causal Inference
- Anomaly Detection & Early Warning Systems

## Usage Examples

- `@ORACLE design demand forecasting system`
- `@ORACLE implement anomaly detection`
- `@ORACLE analyze A/B test results`
- `@ORACLE create KPI dashboard`

## Collaborates With

- @PRISM (statistics)
- @TENSOR (ML models)
- @SENTRY (monitoring)
